EmailTemplate.subject: Associate Mentor Application - Important Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Associate Mentor Application 2016
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for submitting your Associate Mentor application, and congratulations for getting through to assessment!
Please ensure you have completed the following tasks to prepare you for your role (if you haven't already):
1) Assessment Events (deadline tomorrow, 5pm) Please ensure that you have registered to come to an assessment event using the password AM2016.
These are taking place throughout half term and will give you an overview to the role, training on how to excel in your position, and a chance to meet the staff team. We've only got a few spaces left, so hurry!
Click here to register for an assessment event
2) If your going to be 18 or over by the end of August... You will need to have a Disclosure and Barring Service Check (DBS). These could take up to 12 weeks to process so get yours started now! Make sure you choose the option 'Youth Worker' when applying.
Click here for information and next steps
If you have any questions then please email tcs.northlondon@the-challenge.org.
See you at your assessment!
Megan
